articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Cosima Mielke)

articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Juan Diego RodrÃ­guez)

articles.description: In this article, we will enhance the Gantt Chart component with some interaction possibilities for editing the jobs. articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Sergey Krasotin)
articles.description: Looking for ways to test your product faster? In this article, Sergey Krasotin uncovers common mistakes startup product designers make that lead to longer MVP testing times. articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Vitaly Friedman)
articles.description: Do you feel stuck in your company? Do you believe you deserve a raise but it never happens? Do you think you might need to quit the job? Letâ€™s figure it out. In this article, Vitaly looks at some things he wishes heâ€™d known earlier in his career.

articles.author: hello@smashingmagazine.com (Kirill Myshkin)
articles.description: In JavaScript, itâ€™s natural to reach for timers when something is to happen on time. Web Animations API could eliminate the need for timers in certain cases while being precise.
articles.title: Precise Timing With Web Animations API
